channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netanyahu to convene security cabinet after release of 3 hostages
item.description: Hamas militants released three more Israeli hostages on Saturday as part of the ceasefire agreement.

item.description: Animals at Tampa's Florida Aquarium enjoyed Valentine's Day treats, including heart-shaped strawberries and ice treats with their favorite snacks.

item.title: Federal judge hands Musk’s DOGE a win on data access at 3 agencies
item.description: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency can continue to access sensitive records from at least three federal agencies, a judge ruled.

item.title: WATCH: Hamas releases 3 more hostages, including American Sagui Dekel Chen
item.description: Just hours ago, Hamas freed three more hostages, including American Sagui Dekel Chen. Israel, in turn, released hundreds of Palestinian prisoners.

item.title: Eastern U.S. endures flooding with snow forecast to hit Northeast
item.description: Water submerged cars and buildings in Kentucky and mudslides blocked roads in Virginia.
